title: Can I have the list of the Urdu novels of Nimra Ahmed? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nemrah Ahmed has contributed the following pieces to the Urdu Literature: Karakoram ka Taj MahalIbleesJannak kay PattayNamalMashaf (mas-haf)Baily Rajputan ki MalkaSans Sakin ThiMeray Khwab meray jugnuHaddHaalim (ongoing in a monthly urdu magazine)You can find them in hard copy in any bookstore and can read them online in pdf on this website https://www.hamarihub.com/nimra-ahmed-novels/
